llm_responses:
Here are the files in the `src` directory:

- **ast.rs** (3.6KB) - Abstract Syntax Tree definitions
- **environment.rs** (8.9KB) - Environment/scope management
- **error.rs** (8.4KB) - Error handling
- **interpreter.rs** (77.6KB) - Main interpreter logic (largest file)
- **lexer.rs** (12.1KB) - Lexical analysis/tokenization
- **main.rs** (9.4KB) - Entry point
- **parser.rs** (25.2KB) - Parsing logic
- **pretty.rs** (7.6KB) - Pretty printing functionality
- **repl.rs** (7.3KB) - Read-Eval-Print Loop
- **token.rs** (3.9KB) - Token definitions
- **trace.rs** (7.1KB) - Tracing/debugging utilities

This appears to be a Rust project implementing an interpreter with lexing, parsing, AST, environment management, and REPL functionality. The interpreter.rs file is notably the largest, containing the core execution logic.
